ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lvl 52 song
ygData.msgSnippet: i used to feel this way, but Song of Dawn is now almost always memmed for me.  the mobs in velious hit awful hard, and why take the damage when i can evade
ygData.messageBody:
i used to feel this way, but Song of Dawn is now almost always memmed for
me. the mobs in velious hit awful hard, and why take the damage when i can
evade onto a tank who can deal with it so much better. especially the uber
mobs, which i do not last long against, it's part of my twist. in exp
groups, if i got something on me i pulse it in and it almost always switches
back to the tank.

lately i have been going ahead and taking the damage though, looking for
those new defense points (only got 2 so far, hopefully the next patch works
and doubles the chances).

Shada

> I feel the same way about Song of Dawn, I can't remember the
> last I died due
> to bard hate.
